articles.author: Nicholas Vinocur, Victor Goury-Laffont
articles.title: West’s ‘crisis’ coalition grows as Trump rails against Zelenskyy - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Forget about NATO and the EU. Western leaders are building a new diplomatic framework to deal with the White House’s alignment with Moscow.
articles.content: The group started taking shape this week in the wake of the Munich Security Conference when French President Emmanuel Macron invited a small number of like-minded countries to Paris on Monday to disc… [+1526 chars]
